statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 1 \\ 5 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 5 \\ 13 \\ -12 \\ 8 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
